caption.title: Comparison of viral loads from muscles and brain in mice infected through the i.c. route.
caption.p: One-day old suckling mice (n = 3) were infected with IEE through i.c. route of administration. At day 4 post-infection, muscles and brains were harvested and viral loads were quantitated using qRT-PCR. Significant comparisons are labelled *** ( P < 0.001).
Click here for additional data file.
